  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_506</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_506</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Operaciones con enteros 1</string>
            <string language="en">Operations with integers 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Operationen mit Ganzzahlen 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exécutions avec les nombres entiers 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Operações com os inteiros 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzionamenti con i numeri interi 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαδικασίες με τους ακέραιους αριθμούς 1</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones los números enteros. Se estudian en esta unidad, que es la primera parte de un grupo de dos, las operaciones de suma y resta de números enteros.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study integers. This unit (which is the first part of a group of two units) studies the operations of addition and subtraction of integers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">resta</string>
            <string language="en">subtraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">enteros</string>
            <string language="en">integers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">operaciones</string>
            <string language="en">operations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">suma</string>
            <string language="en">addition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">números</string>
            <string language="en">numbers</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, Ganzzahlen zu studieren. Diese Maßeinheit (die 
das erste Teil einer Gruppe von zwei Maßeinheiten ist), studiert die 
Operationen von Hinzufügung und Abzug von Ganzzahlen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier des nombres entiers. Cette unité (qui 
est la première partie d'un groupe de deux unités) étudie les 
exécutions de l'ajout et la soustraction des nombres entiers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar 
inteiros. Esta unidade (que é a primeira parte de um grupo de 
duas unidades) estuda as operações da adição e a subtração dos 
inteiros.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni studiare
i numeri interi. Questa unità (che è la prima parte di un 
gruppo di due unità) studia i funzionamenti dell'aggiunta e la 
sottrazione dei numeri interi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
στους ακέραιους αριθμούς μελέτης. Αυτή η μονάδα (που είναι
το πρώτο μέρος μιας ομάδας δύο μονάδων) μελετά τις διαδικασίες 
της προσθήκης και της αφαίρεσης των ακέραιων αριθμών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abzug</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ganzzahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Operationen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hinzufügung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
